name: Justin
message: View your Family Allowances progress minutes, downloads, messages, and schedule for the current billing cycle.

allowance.title: Minutes
allowance.suheading: Time spent on calls per line toward the allowance for the current billing cycle.

allowance.title: Messages
allowance.suheading: Set allowances on text messages, including features such as text, pictures, and video messages, as well as chargeable instant messages and e-mail sent as text messages.

alerts.desc: This line has no allowance set, meaning that this line's user can message without restrictions.This could result in overage charges on your bill

allowance.title: Downloads
allowance.suheading: Manage downloads for products such as games, apps, ringtones, MegaTones®, individual CallerTunes®, wallpaper, and myFaves® Icons.

alerts.desc: This line has no allowance set, meaning that this line's user can download without restrictions.

changes.desc: Whenever minutes changed from 500 to No Allowance
